org.elasticsearch.index.shard

Class ShadowIndexShard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.shard.AbstractIndexShardComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.index.shard.IndexShard
        • org.elasticsearch.index.shard.ShadowIndexShard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexShardComponent

    public final class ShadowIndexShard
extends IndexShard
    ShadowIndexShard extends IndexShard to add file synchronization from the primary when a flush happens. It also ensures that a replica being promoted to a primary causes the shard to fail, kicking off a re-allocation of the primary shard.

    • Nested Class Summary

      TranslogStats translogStats() 
      void updateRoutingEntry(ShardRouting newRouting, boolean persistState)
      In addition to the regular accounting done in IndexShard.updateRoutingEntry(org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.ShardRouting, boolean), if this shadow replica needs to be promoted to a primary, the shard is failed in order to allow a new primary to be re-allocated.
